Interface MessageRepository

  • Method Details

    • INSERT_MESSAGE

      Long INSERT_MESSAGE(Long PosterID, Long SessionID, String MsgContent, Long MessageID) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Inserts a new message into the database
      Parameters:
      PosterID - ID field of SessionUser class
      SessionID - ID field of SessionRoom class
      MsgContent - MsgContent field of Message class
      MessageID - ID field of Message class
      Returns:
      the new Message ID
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • INSERT_REPLY

      Long INSERT_REPLY(Long posterID, Long sessionID, Long replyToID, String msgContent, Long newMessageID) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Inserts a reply into the database
      Parameters:
      posterID - ID field of SessionUser class
      sessionID - ID field of SessionRoom class
      replyToID - ID field of Message class
      msgContent - MsgContent field of Message class
      newMessageID - ID field of Message class
      Returns:
      The new message ID
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • RETRIEVE_MESSAGES

      List<Message> RETRIEVE_MESSAGES(Long sessionID) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Returns an ordered list by MessageID
      Parameters:
      sessionID - ID field of SessionRoom class
      Returns:
      List containing all Message objects in the DB for that SessionRoom
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • UPDATE_MESSAGE

      void UPDATE_MESSAGE(Long messageID, Long posterID, Long sessionID, String newBody) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Updates the message content of a message given all of its ID information
      Parameters:
      messageID - ID field of Message class
      posterID - ID field of SessionUser class
      sessionID - ID field of SessionRoom class
      newBody - String that will become the new MsgContent field of the Message class
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • FLIP_VISIBILITY

      void FLIP_VISIBILITY(Long messageID, Long posterID, Long sessionID) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Toggles whether a message is visible.
      Parameters:
      messageID - ID field of the Message class
      posterID - ID field of the poster class
      sessionID - ID field of the SessionRoom class
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • DELETE_MESSAGE

      Parameters:
      messageID - ID field of Message class
      posterID - ID field of SessionUser class
      sessionID - ID field of SessionRoom class
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException

    • LIKE_MESSAGE

      boolean LIKE_MESSAGE(Long messageID, Long likerID, boolean liked) throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
      Toggles a like for a specific message from a specific user.
      Parameters:
      messageID - ID field of the Message class
      likerID - ID field of the SessionUser clas
      liked - INOUT parameter that will be returned by the DB
      Returns:
      boolean True if the message has been changed to 'liked', false otherwise.
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the Database, it will throw a SQLGrammarException which is of type PersistenceException
